verses.verse: <S%G3326>After<s%> <S%G5023>this<s%> there was a <S%G1859>feast<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews;<s%> and <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G305>went<s%> up to <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> there is <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> by the <S%G4262>sheep<s%> market a <S%G2861>pool,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1951>called<s%> in the <S%G1447>Hebrew<s%> <S%G1447>tongue<s%> <S%G964>Bethesda,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G4745>porches.<s%>

In <S%G5025>these<s%> <S%G2621>lay<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of <S%G770>weak<s%> folk, of <S%G5185>blind,<s%> <S%G5560>halt,<s%> <S%G3584>withered,<s%> <S%G1551>waiting<s%> for the <S%G2796>moving<s%> of the <S%G5204>water.<s%>

For an <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2597>went<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G2596>at<s%> a certain <S%G2540>season<s%> <S%G1722>into<s%> the <S%G2861>pool,<s%> and <S%G5015>troubled<s%> the <S%G5204>water:<s%> <S%G3588>whoever<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G5015>troubling<s%> of the <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G1684>stepped<s%> in was <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5199>whole<s%> of <S%G1221>whatever<s%> <S%G3553>disease<s%> he <S%G2722>had.<s%>
And a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> was <S%G1563>there,<s%> which <S%G2192>had<s%> an <S%G769>infirmity<s%> <S%G5144>thirty<s%> and <S%G3638>eight<s%> <S%G2094>years.<s%>

When <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> him <S%G2621>lie,<s%> and <S%G1097>knew<s%> that he had <S%G2192>been<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> a <S%G4183>long<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> in that case, he <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2309>Will<s%> you be <S%G1096>made<s%> whole? <S%G5199><s%>

The <S%G770>weak<s%> man <S%G611>answered<s%> him, <S%G2962>Sir,<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%> is <S%G5015>troubled,<s%> to <S%G906>put<s%> me <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2861>pool:<s%> but <S%G1722>while<s%> <S%G3739><s%> I am <S%G2064>coming,<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G2597>steps<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> me.
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1453>Rise,<s%> <S%G142>take<s%> up your <S%G2895>bed,<s%> and walk. <S%G4043><s%>

And <S%G2112>immediately<s%> the <S%G444>man<s%> was <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5199>whole,<s%> and <S%G142>took<s%> up his <S%G2895>bed,<s%> and <S%G4043>walked:<s%> and <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G1565>same<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> was the <S%G4521>sabbath.<s%>

The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him that was <S%G2323>cured,<s%> It is the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day: it is not <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for you to <S%G142>carry<s%> your <S%G2895>bed.<s%>
He <S%G611>answered<s%> them, He that <S%G4160>made<s%> me <S%G5199>whole,<s%> the <S%G1565>same<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to me, <S%G142>Take<s%> up your <S%G2895>bed,<s%> and <S%G4043>walk.<s%>
<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2065>asked<s%> they him, <S%G3739>What<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> is that <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to you, <S%G142>Take<s%> up your <S%G2895>bed,<s%> and <S%G4043>walk?<s%>

And he that was <S%G2390>healed<s%> <S%G1492>knew<s%> not <S%G5101>who<s%> it was: for <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G1593>conveyed<s%> himself <S%G1593>away,<s%> a <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> in that <S%G5117>place.<s%>

<S%G3326>Afterward<s%> <S%G5023><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2147>finds<s%> him in the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G2396>Behold,<s%> you are <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5199>whole:<s%> <S%G264>sin<s%> <S%G3371>no<s%> <S%G3371>more,<s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> a <S%G5501>worse<s%> thing <S%G1096>come<s%> to you.
The <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G565>departed,<s%> and <S%G312>told<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> that it was <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> had <S%G4160>made<s%> him <S%G5199>whole.<s%>

And <S%G1223>therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> did the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G1377>persecute<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and <S%G2212>sought<s%> to <S%G615>slay<s%> him, <S%G3754>because<s%> he had <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day.
But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> them, My <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2038>works<s%> till now, <S%G2193><s%> <S%G737><s%> and I work. <S%G2038><s%>

<S%G1223>Therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2212>sought<s%> the <S%G3123>more<s%> to <S%G615>kill<s%> him, <S%G3754>because<s%> he not <S%G3440>only<s%> had <S%G3089>broken<s%> the <S%G4521>sabbath,<s%> but <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> was his <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G4160>making<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G2470>equal<s%> with <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G281>Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, The <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> of <S%G1438>himself,<s%> but <S%G5100>what<s%> he <S%G991>sees<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G4160>do:<s%> for <S%G5100>what<s%> things soever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> he <S%G4160>does,<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4160>does<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> likewise. <S%G3668><s%>

For the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G5368>loves<s%> the <S%G5207>Son,<s%> and <S%G1166>shows<s%> him <S%G3956>all<s%> things that <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G4160>does:<s%> and he will <S%G1166>show<s%> him <S%G3187>greater<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> than <S%G5130>these,<s%> that you may marvel. <S%G2296><s%>

For as the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1453>raises<s%> up the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and vivifies <S%G2227><s%> them; <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2227>vivifies<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he will. <S%G2309><s%>
For the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2919>judges<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man,<s%> but has <S%G1325>committed<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%> to the Son: <S%G5207><s%>

That all <S%G3956><s%> men should <S%G5091>honor<s%> the <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G2531>even<s%> as they <S%G5091>honor<s%> the <S%G3962>Father.<s%> He that <S%G5091>honors<s%> not the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G5091>honors<s%> not the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> has <S%G3992>sent<s%> him.

<S%G281>Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, He that <S%G191>hears<s%> my <S%G3056>word,<s%> and <S%G4100>believes<s%> on him that <S%G3992>sent<s%> me, <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G166>everlasting<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> and shall not <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2920>condemnation;<s%> but is <S%G3327>passed<s%> from <S%G2288>death<s%> to life. <S%G2222><s%>

<S%G281>Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, The <S%G5610>hour<s%> is <S%G2064>coming,<s%> and <S%G3568>now<s%> is, <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> shall <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> and they that <S%G191>hear<s%> shall live. <S%G2198><s%>

For as the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> in <S%G1438>himself;<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> has he <S%G1325>given<s%> to the <S%G5207>Son<s%> to <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> in himself; <S%G1438><s%>
And has <S%G1325>given<s%> him <S%G1849>authority<s%> to <S%G4160>execute<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he is the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of man. <S%G444><s%>

<S%G2296>Marvel<s%> not at <S%G5124>this:<s%> for the <S%G5610>hour<s%> is <S%G2064>coming,<s%> in the <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that are in the <S%G3419>graves<s%> shall <S%G191>hear<s%> his voice, <S%G5456><s%>

And shall <S%G1607>come<s%> <S%G1607>forth;<s%> they that have <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G18>good,<s%> to the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of <S%G2222>life;<s%> and they that have <S%G4238>done<s%> <S%G5337>evil,<s%> to the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of damnation. <S%G2920><s%>

I <S%G1410>can<s%> of <S%G1683>my<s%> own <S%G1683>self<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> nothing: <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3762><s%> as I <S%G191>hear,<s%> I <S%G2919>judge:<s%> and my <S%G2920>judgment<s%> is <S%G1342>just;<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G2212>seek<s%> not <S%G1699>my<s%> own <S%G2307>will,<s%> but the <S%G2307>will<s%> of the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> has <S%G3992>sent<s%> me.
<S%G1437>If<s%> I <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of <S%G1683>myself,<s%> my <S%G3141>witness<s%> is not true. <S%G227><s%>

There is <S%G243>another<s%> that <S%G3140>bears<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of me; and I <S%G1492>know<s%> that the <S%G3141>witness<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G3140>witnesses<s%> of me is true. <S%G227><s%>
You <S%G649>sent<s%> to <S%G2491>John,<s%> and he <S%G3140>bore<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> to the truth. <S%G225><s%>
But I <S%G2983>receive<s%> not <S%G3141>testimony<s%> from <S%G444>man:<s%> but <S%G5023>these<s%> things I <S%G3004>say,<s%> that you might be saved. <S%G4982><s%>
He was a <S%G2545>burning<s%> and a <S%G5316>shining<s%> <S%G3088>light:<s%> and you were <S%G2309>willing<s%> for a <S%G5610>season<s%> to <S%G21>rejoice<s%> in his light. <S%G5457><s%>

But I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3187>greater<s%> <S%G3141>witness<s%> than that of <S%G2491>John:<s%> for the <S%G2041>works<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> has <S%G1325>given<s%> me to <S%G5048>finish,<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> that I <S%G4160>do,<s%> <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of me, that the <S%G3962>Father<s%> has <S%G649>sent<s%> me.

And the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G846>himself,<s%> which has <S%G3992>sent<s%> me, has borne <S%G3140>witness<s%> of me. You have <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> his <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G4455>at<s%> <S%G4455>any<s%> <S%G4455>time,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G3708>seen<s%> his shape. <S%G1491><s%>
And you <S%G2192>have<s%> not his <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3306>abiding<s%> in you: for <S%G3739>whom<s%> he has <S%G649>sent,<s%> him you <S%G4100>believe<s%> not.
<S%G2045>Search<s%> the <S%G1124>scriptures;<s%> for in them you <S%G1380>think<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life:<s%> and they are they which <S%G3140>testify<s%> of me.
And you <S%G2309>will<s%> not <S%G2064>come<s%> to me, that you might <S%G2192>have<s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>
I <S%G2983>receive<s%> not <S%G1391>honor<s%> from men. <S%G444><s%>
But I <S%G1097>know<s%> you, that you <S%G2192>have<s%> not the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in you.

I am <S%G2064>come<s%> in my <S%G3962>Father's<s%> <S%G3686>name,<s%> and you <S%G2983>receive<s%> me not: <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> shall <S%G2064>come<s%> in his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3686>name,<s%> him you will receive. <S%G2983><s%>

<S%G4459>How<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> you <S%G4100>believe,<s%> which <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1391>honor<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> of <S%G240>another,<s%> and <S%G2212>seek<s%> not the <S%G1391>honor<s%> that comes from <S%G2316>God<s%> only? <S%G3441><s%>

<S%G4160>Do<s%> not <S%G1380>think<s%> that I will <S%G2723>accuse<s%> you to the <S%G3962>Father:<s%> there is one that <S%G2723>accuses<s%> you, even <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> in <S%G3739>whom<s%> you trust. <S%G1679><s%>
For had you <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> you would <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> me; for he <S%G1125>wrote<s%> of me.
But <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G4100>believe<s%> not his <S%G1121>writings,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> shall you <S%G4100>believe<s%> my words? <S%G4487><s%>
